subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Lofton scored 14 points, including 2 on a jump shot with 1 minute 15 seconds left, as No. 1 Tennessee defeated Kentucky, 63-60, on Sunday to stay atop the Southeastern Conference.
snippet: Chris Lofton scored 14 points, including 2 on a jump shot with 1 minute 15 seconds left, as No. 1 Tennessee defeated Kentucky, 63-60, on Sunday to stay atop the Southeastern Conference.
